applicant-information.page-title: Parent or legal guardian personal information
applicant-information.form-instructions-sin: Please provide your legal name as indicated on your Social Insurance Number (SIN) card or letter.
applicant-information.form-instructions-info: We'll use the information you provided to verify your identity. Any information that does not match the information on your SIN application may cause a delay in the processing of your application.
applicant-information.single-legal-name: If you have a single legal name
applicant-information.name-instructions: If using a single legal name, please enter that name in BOTH the first name and last name fields.

error-message.marital-status-no-partner-information: If you are married or in a common-law relationship you must enter their information on the next page. Select your marital status and press 'Save'.
error-message.sin-unique: The Social Insurance Number (SIN) must be unique
error-message.date-of-birth-day-required: Date of birth must include a day
error-message.date-of-birth-is-past: Date of birth must be in the past
error-message.date-of-birth-is-past-valid: Date of birth too far in the past
error-message.date-of-birth-month-required: Date of birth must include a month
error-message.date-of-birth-valid: Day must be valid for the given month and year
error-message.date-of-birth-year-number: Year must be a number, for example 1950
error-message.date-of-birth-year-required: Date of birth must include a year
error-message.characters-valid: Only letters, numbers and the following characters are accepted: apostrophe ('), comma (,), period (.), hyphen (-) and bracket ()
error-message.first-name-no-digits: First name must contain letters only
error-message.last-name-no-digits: Last name must contain letters only

new-or-existing-member.previously-enrolled: Have you ever been enrolled in the Canadian Dental Care Plan?
new-or-existing-member.client-number-description: You can find your 11-digit Client Number in the upper right corner of the letter from Service Canada or on your Canadian Dental Care Plan member card.

error-message.is-new-or-existing-member-required: Please select whether you are new or existing member of CDCP

index.in-this-section: In this section you will add your child(ren) to the application.
index.dental-insurance-title: Access to other dental insurance or coverage
index.dental-benefit-has-access: Has access to the following benefits:

modal.info: Do you want to remove {{childName}} from this application?

index.removed-child: {{childName}} has been removed from the application

information.form-instructions-sin: Provide the child's legal name as indicated on their Social Insurance Number (SIN) card or letter (if available), or other government documentation.
information.single-legal-name: If the child has a single legal name
information.name-instructions: If the child uses a single legal name, please enter that name in BOTH the first name and last name fields.
information.sin-legend: Does this child have a Social Insurance Number (SIN)?
information.sin-no: No, this child does not have a SIN
information.parent-legend: Are you the parent or legal guardian of this child?

error-message.sin-unique: The Social Insurance Number (SIN) must be unique
error-message.date-of-birth-day-required: Date of birth must include a day
error-message.date-of-birth-is-past: Date of birth must be in the past
error-message.date-of-birth-is-past-valid: Date of birth too far in the past
error-message.date-of-birth-month-required: Date of birth must include a month
error-message.date-of-birth-valid: Day must be valid for the given month and year
error-message.date-of-birth-year-number: Year must be a number, for example 1950
error-message.date-of-birth-year-required: Date of birth must include a year
error-message.has-social-insurance-number: Select whether the child has a SIN
error-message.is-parent: Select whether you are the parent or legal guardian of the child
error-message.characters-valid: Only letters, numbers and the following characters are accepted: apostrophe ('), comma (,), period (.), hyphen (-) and bracket ()
error-message.first-name-no-digits: First name must contain letters only
error-message.last-name-no-digits: Last name must contain letters only

dental-insurance.title: {{childName}}: access to other dental insurance
dental-insurance.legend: Does {{childName}} have access to dental insurance or coverage:

list.employment: Through a parent or legal guardian's employment benefits including health and wellness accounts
list.pension: Through a parent or legal guardian's pension benefits
list.purchased: Purchased by a parent or legal guardian from an insurance or benefits company
list.professional: Through a professional or student organization

dental-insurance.option-yes: Yes, this child has access to dental insurance or coverage
dental-insurance.option-no: No, this child does not have access to dental insurance or coverage

additional-info.title: Additional information
additional-info.eligible: A child is still considered to have access to dental insurance or coverage if a parent or legal guardian chooses to opt out of benefits provided through:
additional-info.not-eligible: As such, the child is not eligible for Canadian Dental Care Plan.
additional-info.not-eligible-purchased: If a parent or legal guardian purchased the current dental insurance policy privately, the child is not eligible for the Canadian Dental Care Plan while that coverage is in effect.
additional-info.excepton: Exception: A child may still be eligible if a parent or legal guardian are retired and:

exception-list.opted-out: Opted out of pension benefits before December 11, 2023, and
exception-list.opt-back: Can't opt back in under the pension rules

error-message.dental-insurance-required: Select whether the child has access to dental insurance

dental-benefits.title: {{childName}}: access to other federal, provincial or territorial dental benefits
dental-benefits.access-to-dental: Access to dental coverage through a provincial, territorial or federal government social program will not impact the child's eligibility for the Canadian Dental Care Plan.
dental-benefits.eligibility-criteria: If the child meets all the eligibility criteria, their coverage will be coordinated between the plans to ensure there are no gaps or duplication in coverage.

federal-benefits.title: Federal benefits
federal-benefits.legend: Does {{childName}} have dental benefits through a social program offered by a federal program?
federal-benefits.option-no: No, this child does not have federal dental benefits

social-programs.legend: Please select which social program this child is covered under. If this child has more than one, please select the one you use most.

provincial-territorial-benefits.title: Provincial or territorial benefits
provincial-territorial-benefits.legend: Does {{childName}} have dental benefits through a social program offered by your province or territory?
provincial-territorial-benefits.option-yes: Yes, this child has provincial or territorial dental benefits
provincial-territorial-benefits.option-no: No, this child does not have provincial or territorial dental benefits

social-programs.input-legend: If yes, through which province or territory?
social-programs.radio-legend: Please select which social program this child is covered under. If this child has more than one, please select the one you use most.

error-message.federal-benefit-program-required: Select which federal program the child is covered under
error-message.federal-benefit-required: Select whether the child has federal dental benefits
error-message.provincial-benefit-program-required: Select which provincial or territorial program the child is covered under
error-message.provincial-benefit-required: Select whether the child has provincial or territorial dental benefits

parent-or-guardian.page-title: You must be a parent or legal guardian
parent-or-guardian.must-be: You must be a parent or legal guardian.
parent-or-guardian.unable-to-apply: You are not able to apply for this child. You must be a parent or legal guardian to apply on behalf of a child.

cannot-apply-child.page-title: Find out when you can apply
cannot-apply-child.ineligible-to-apply: Your child is not currently eligible for the Canadian Dental Care Plan.
cannot-apply-child.eligibility-info: The Canadian Dental Care Plan is currently accepting applications for people aged 65 and above, children under 18, and adults with a valid disability tax credit.
cannot-apply-child.eligibility-2025: Adults 18 to 64 who do not have a disability tax credit will be able to apply for the Canadian Dental Care Plan in 2025.
cannot-apply-child.when-to-apply: Find out when you can apply for the Canadian Dental Care Plan

communication-preference.note: If your child is eligible, we will share your and your child's information with Sun Life Assurance Company of Canada (Sun Life). Sun Life will be responsible for handling member enrolment and administering claims processing and benefits for the Canadian Dental Care Plan.
communication-preference.preferred-method: What is your preferred method of communication for Sun Life?
communication-preference.preferred-language: What is your preferred official language of communication?

error-message.email-match: The email addresses entered do not match
error-message.email-valid: Enter an email address in the correct format, such as name@example.com
error-message.confirm-email-valid: Enter confirmation of email address in the correct format, such as name@example.com

confirm.make-note: Save this code, you'll need it to check the status of your application.
confirm.keep-copy: Keep a copy of your application
confirm.print-copy-text: You will not receive a confirmation email. It is important to keep a copy of your application. You can use this button to print.
confirm.begin-process: We have received your application. Nothing further is required from you at this time.
confirm.cdcp-checker: You can use the <cdcpLink>Canadian Dental Care Plan Status Checker</cdcpLink> or call <noWrap>1-833-537-4342</noWrap> to track the progress of your application or to receive more information.
confirm.use-code: You can use your application code to track the progress within 48 hours of applying.
confirm.mail-letter: Once your application is processed, we will mail you a letter to inform you whether your application has been accepted or rejected.
confirm.register-msca-title: Register for a My Service Canada Account (MSCA) - Coming soon
confirm.register-msca-text: Prepare to get important updates about your Canadian Dental Care Plan application by registering for a <mscaLinkAccount>My Service Canada Account (MSCA)</mscaLinkAccount>.
confirm.register-msca-info: Soon, you will be able to view the following information in MSCA:
confirm.register-msca-correspondence: Official correspondence from the Government of Canada
confirm.register-msca-confirm: Letters confirming acceptance or rejection of your application
confirm.register-msca-checker: While we work on making these features available, we encourage you to use the <mscaLinkChecker>Canadian Dental Care Plan Status Checker</mscaLinkChecker> to stay updated on your application's progress.
confirm.register-msca-title-featured: Register for a My Service Canada Account (MSCA)
confirm.register-msca-text-featured: Get important updates about your Canadian Dental Care Plan application by registering for a <mscaLinkAccount>My Service Canada Account</mscaLinkAccount>.
confirm.register-msca-info-featured: Once your application is processed, sign in to your account to view the following information in MSCA:
confirm.how-insurance: How do I use my Canadian Dental Care Plan
confirm.eligible-text: If your child is deemed eligible, Sun Life will send them a welcome package. The welcome package will include your child's member card and details about the Canadian Dental Care Plan, including their coverage start date. The Canadian Dental Care Plan will not cover dental services received before that start date.
confirm.more-info-cdcp: For more information on what services and how much will be covered, visit <moreInfoLink>Canadian Dental Care Plan: What is covered</moreInfoLink>.
confirm.dental-benefit-has-access: Has access to the following benefits:
confirm.consent-answer: My spouse or common-law partner is aware and has consented to sharing of their personal information.
confirm.dental-private: Access to dental insurance or coverage

modal.info: By closing the application, you will end your session and any information entered will be cleared from your browser. Make sure you printed or save a copy of your application code.
modal.are-you-sure: Are you sure you want to close the application?

contact-apply-child.page-title: Contact us to apply for your child
contact-apply-child.speak-service-canada: You must speak to a Service Canada representative if you are under 16 and applying for your child.
contact-apply-child.contact-service-canada: Please contact Service Canada by calling <noWrap>1-833-537-4342</noWrap> or visit a <serviceCanadaOfficeLink>Service Canada Office</serviceCanadaOfficeLink>.

exit-application.are-you-sure: Are you sure you want to exit this application? If you click "Exit", the form will reset and the information will be lost.
exit-application.click-back: Click "Back" to return to the form.

partner-information.provide-sin: Provide information on your current spouse or common-law partner as indicated on their Social Insurance Number (SIN) card or letter.
partner-information.required-information: The information is required to calculate the adjusted family net income. Your spouse or common-law partner must submit their own application for the Canadian Dental Care Plan.
partner-information.single-legal-name: If your spouse or common-law partner has a single legal name
partner-information.name-instructions: If using a single legal name, please enter that name in BOTH the first name and last name fields.
partner-information.confirm-checkbox: I confirm that my spouse or common-law partner is aware and has agreed to the sharing of their personal information.

contact-information.page-title: Parent or legal guardian contact information
contact-information.add-phone: Adding a phone number helps Government of Canada contact you if there is an issue with your application. Otherwise, we'll contact you by mail.
contact-information.add-email: Adding an email will help the Government of Canada and Sun Life contact you regarding your Canadian Dental Care Plan membership.

home-address.use-mailing-address: My mailing address is the same as my home address

mailing-address.address-required: Enter mailing address, typically number and street
mailing-address.city-required: Enter a city or town for your mailing address
mailing-address.country-required: Select a country for your mailing address
mailing-address.postal-code-required: Enter postal code or zip code for your mailing address
mailing-address.postal-code-valid: Enter mailing address postal code in the correct format, such as A1A 1A1
mailing-address.province-required: Select a province, territory, state or region for your mailing address
mailing-address.zip-code-valid: Enter mailing address zip code in the correct format, such as 12345 or 12345-6789
mailing-address.invalid-postal-code-for-country: A Canadian postal code in the mailing address was entered but Canada was not selected as the country. Please select Canada, and the proper province, or change the postal code
mailing-address.invalid-postal-code-for-province: The postal code does not match the province or territory you selected

home-address.address-required: Enter home address, typically number and street
home-address.city-required: Enter a city or town for your home address
home-address.country-required: Select a country for your home address
home-address.postal-code-required: Enter postal code or zip code for your home address
home-address.postal-code-valid: Enter home address postal code in the correct format, such as A1A 1A1
home-address.province-required: Select a province, territory, state or region for your home address
home-address.zip-code-valid: Enter home address zip code in the correct format, such as 12345 or 12345-6789
home-address.invalid-postal-code-for-country: A Canadian postal code in the home address was entered but Canada was not selected as the country. Please select Canada, and the proper province, or change the postal code
home-address.invalid-postal-code-for-province: The postal code does not match the province or territory you selected

error-message.phone-number-valid-international: Phone number does not exist. If it's an international phone number, add '+' in front
error-message.phone-number-alt-valid-international: Phone number does not exist. If it's an international phone number, add '+' in front

spouse-consent.label: Consent
spouse-consent.yes: My spouse or common-law partner is aware and has consented to sharing of their personal information.
spouse-consent.no: My spouse or common-law partner is aware and has not consented to sharing of their personal information.

review-adult-information.submit-p-proceed: By proceeding with this application, you are agreeing to attest truthfully to the information provided.
review-adult-information.submit-p-false-info: If you provide false information on your application, you and others you applied for may be removed from the plan.
review-adult-information.submit-p-repayment: If you or your family members were not eligible to apply, you or your family member may have to repay the full cost of care received through the Canadian Dental Care Plan.

review-child-information.read-carefully: Please review this information carefully. The information provided will be used by Sun Life to create your child(ren)'s member account.
review-child-information.is-parent: Parent or legal guardian of child

review-child-information.dental-benefit-change: Change answer to government dental benefits
